node.name: Topcased Ecore Editor
node.shortdescription:
Discontinued and replaced by ECORE Tools

The Topcased Ecore Editor provides a graphical editor to quickly edit your ecore models.

Features of the Ecore editor :


  • validation framework to check your model

  • complete tabbed properties view to edit graphical or model informations, extended metadata...

  • multi-diagram support

  • SVG, PNG, JPEG, GIF export

  • recreate a diagram from your existing ecore models

  • use the registered packages

  • ...and more, see our web site and try this great editor !
node.body:
Discontinued and replaced by ECORE Tools

The Topcased Ecore Editor provides a graphical editor to quickly edit your ecore models.

Features of the Ecore editor :


  • validation framework to check your model

  • complete tabbed properties view to edit graphical or model informations, extended metadata...

  • multi-diagram support

  • SVG, PNG, JPEG, GIF export

  • recreate a diagram from your existing ecore models

  • use the registered packages

  • ...and more, see our web site and try this great editor !
